channel.title: CVE Feed for SourceCodester -- Train Scheduler App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SourceCodester -- Train Scheduler App

item.title: CVE-2022-3774|2024-08-03T01:20:58.379Z -- sourcecodester -- train%20scheduler%20app
item.description: A vulnerability was found in SourceCodester Train Scheduler App 1.0 and classified as critical. Affected by this issue is some unknown functionality of the file /train_scheduler_app/?action=delete. The manipulation of the argument id leads to improper control of resource identifiers. The attack may be launched remotely. The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-212504.
